readme.description: A path to the ReadMe file for this bot.

configurationSchema.description: The path to the GraphQL schema file that defines the configuration for this bot. This file should contain a Configuration object type for it to be useful. The GraphQL schema that this bot consumes will automatically have a configuration field included on the Query type which gives the bot access to the configuration values.

dependenciesSchema.description: A path to where the GraphQL schema consumed by this bot should be written to. This file will be auto-generated by the bot factory.

excludeConfigurationFromDependenciesSche.description: Whether or not to exclude the configuration types from the generated schema in the dependenciesSchema path.

dependencies.description: The dependencies of this bot. The keys are the bot IDs and the values are the bot versions.

private.description: Whether the bot should be private or not. Private bots are not visible to other Codegen Bot users unless you explicitly give them access via a team.

exec.description: A list of named command line programs that can be executed by calling `codegen.bot exec COMMAND_NAME`.
